This website is built with, Jekyll. Jekyll is a static website generator. This allows us to serve a very light and fast website, which is fully customizable. There are many plugins, CMS solutions, etc â€¦ to make it your own. This post is written in markdown, which is an easy to use markup-language. Jekyll supports Liquid and is written in Ruby, it benefits from the Ruby Gem ecosystem, a lot of extra functionality is available. This website is hosted on GitHub Pages, which supports Jekyll websites. Discover Jekyll here: Jekyll.

The header animation is made in Blender, a great free 3D design program, check it out here: Blender
